Name.hint: What do you wish to be called? (full name)

Agility.hint: How fast or nimble are you on your feet?

Endurance.hint: How much can you take before breaking?

Charisma.hint: How easily do you influence or connect with others?

MaxMana.hint: How much magical energy can you hold?

Melee.hint: How skilled are you in close combat?

Ranged.hint: How accurate are you with ranged attacks?

Defense.hint: How well can you guard or protect yourself?

Stealth.hint: How good are you at avoiding attention?

Tracking.hint: How well can you follow people, paths, or trails?

Tactics.hint: How strategically do you approach challenges?

Perception.hint: How observant are you of your surroundings?
